verses.text: When I \w was|strong="H1732"\w* waiting quietly \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* Lord, \w his|strong="H1732"\w* heart \w was|strong="H1732"\w* turned \w to|strong="H1732"\w* me, \w and|strong="H1732"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* gave ear \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* cry.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w took|strong="H5186"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w up|strong="H0413"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* deep waste place, \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* soft \w and|strong="H3068"\w* sticky earth; \w he|strong="H3068"\w* put \w my|strong="H8085"\w* feet \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* rock, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* steps \w certain|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w put|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* new song \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* mouth, \w even|strong="H5921"\w* praise \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* God; numbers \w have|strong="H5921"\w* seen \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* fear, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w put|strong="H5927"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* faith \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord.

Happy \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H7200"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* faith \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w does|strong="H3068"\w* not \w give|strong="H5414"\w* honour \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* men \w of|strong="H0430"\w* pride \w or|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w turned|strong="H5414"\w* away \w to|strong="H3068"\w* deceit.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, great \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* wonders \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* done \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w thought|strong="H7760"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w*; \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* possible \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* order \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*; \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H7760"\w* \w an|strong="H7760"\w* account \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w their|strong="H3068"\w* number \w is|strong="H0834"\w* greater \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* say.

\w You|strong="H0859"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* desire \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w offerings|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* beasts \w or|strong="H0369"\w* fruits \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* earth; ears \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w for|strong="H0413"\w* burned \w offerings|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* sin \w offerings|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* request.

\w Then|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* said, See, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* come; \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H3808"\w* recorded \w of|strong="H2077"\w* \w me|strong="H7592"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* roll \w of|strong="H2077"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* book,

\w My|strong="H5921"\w* delight \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w do|strong="H0935"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* pleasure, O \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H0559"\w*; truly, \w your|strong="H5921"\w* law \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* heart.

I \w have|strong="H0430"\w* given news \w of|strong="H0430"\w* righteousness \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w great|strong="H0430"\w* meeting; \w O|strong="H0430"\w* Lord, \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H0430"\w* knowledge \w that|strong="H0430"\w* I \w have|strong="H0430"\w* not \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* back \w my|strong="H8432"\w* \w words|strong="H8451"\w*.

\w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* folded away \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H8193"\w*; \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* clear \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w true|strong="H3068"\w* word \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* salvation; \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w kept|strong="H3607"\w* secret \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* faith \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* meeting.

\w Take|strong="H3680"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* away \w your|strong="H3808"\w* gentle mercies \w from|strong="H8432"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*, O \w Lord|strong="H2617"\w*; \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* mercy \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w faith|strong="H0571"\w* \w keep|strong="H3680"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w* safe \w for|strong="H3808"\w* ever.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* unnumbered evils \w are|strong="H3068"\w* round \w about|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*; \w my|strong="H3068"\w* sins \w have|strong="H0859"\w* overtaken \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w so|strong="H4480"\w* \w that|strong="H4480"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* bent down \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* weight; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* hairs \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* head, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* strength \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w gone|strong="H4480"\w* \w because|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H3808"\w* pleased, O Lord, \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w take|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w danger|strong="H7451"\w*; O Lord, come quickly \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w give|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* help.

Let those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* go after \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w its|strong="H7521"\w* destruction \w have|strong="H3068"\w* shame \w and|strong="H3068"\w* trouble together; let \w them|strong="H5337"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* turned back \w and|strong="H3068"\w* made foolish \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H5337"\w* \w pleasure|strong="H7521"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* trouble.

\w Let|strong="H5315"\w* \w those|strong="H5315"\w* \w who|strong="H5315"\w* say \w to|strong="H0954"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, Aha, aha! \w be|strong="H5315"\w* surprised because \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w their|strong="H1245"\w* \w shame|strong="H0954"\w*.

Let all \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H0559"\w* \w are|strong="H8074"\w* looking \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* be glad \w and|strong="H8074"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w joy|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*; let \w the|strong="H0559"\w* lovers \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* salvation ever \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, May \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Lord be great.

Though \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* poor \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* need, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H8055"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* mind; \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* help \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* saviour; \w let|strong="H8055"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* waiting, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.
